metadata.inclusion:
1. Swipe down to access Settings
2. Touch Advanced Settings
3. Enter code
4. Touch Installation
5. Touch Devices
6. Touch Z-Wave Devices
7. Touch Add Device
8. Touch Pair
9. Press pair or learn button on device
10. Adjust device name as needed
11. Select Automation
12. Click Add to save
metadata.exclusion:
1. Swipe down to access Settings
2. Touch Advanced Settings
3. Enter code
4. Touch Installation
5. Touch Devices
6. Touch Z-Wave Devices
7. Touch Delete failed device from panel
8. Check boxes next to devices you want to delete
9. Touch Delete
metadata.reset:
1. Swipe down to access Settings
2. Touch Advanced Settings
3. Enter code
4. Touch Installation
5. Touch Devices
6. Touch Z-Wave Devices
7. Touch Remove All Devices
